recipesJson.name: OhMSlice
recipesJson.author: VaporVixen
recipesJson.description: This is a wonderful summer vape. A friend of mine wants me to clone "Naked, Sweet Sour". After looking at the bottle & listening to her description, I came up with this recipe. She tasted it & said it has a little more Lime flavor in it from the original but is very good. Tastes like a lemon drop candy to me. Although not a identical clone, Very delicious! Pairs well with any citric drink. Enjoy <3
